parameters.query:
WITH v AS (
  SELECT
    NULLIF('{{ String($json.realm ?? "default").replace(/'/g, "''") }}','') AS realm_key,
    GREATEST(0, COALESCE(NULLIF('{{ String($json.limit ?? 20) }}',''), '20')::int) AS lim
)
SELECT
  v.realm_key AS realm,
  v.lim AS limit,
  itsm.process_pii_redaction_requests(itsm.set_rls_context(v.realm_key), v.lim, true) AS summary
FROM v;
